items.title: Real-time Task Assignment and Updates
items.description: Enable team members to assign tasks to each other and receive real-time updates on task status changes.
acceptance_criteria: Users can assign tasks to specific team members.
Task status changes are visible to all team members within 5 seconds.
Assigned users receive a notification upon task assignment.
Task updates are synchronized across all devices.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Notifications should be delivered within 3 seconds of task update.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core feature is real-time collaborative task management with notifications. Additional features like file sharing, comments, and integrations may be needed in future epics.
